original_title: I Told You Not to Call the Police
overview: A terrified babysitter endures a harrowing home invasion, only to discover her nightmare has just begun when she disobeys her attacker's command not to report the crime to the police. Later, when the maniac returns to make good on his threat, the babysitter realizes he'll stop at nothing to make her pay for her insolence.
title: I Told You Not to Call the Police
